text.config.usefulanvil-config.title: Useful Anvil
text.config.usefulanvil-config.option.di: Displays the percentage of the mending ability left
text.config.usefulanvil-config.option.me:
How mending works in relation to this mod
    Linear: Mending slowly stops working
    Stop at end: Mending stops working when the efficacy reaches 0%
text.config.usefulanvil-config.option.re: How many times mending can fully repair an item before no longer working
